khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ma rig pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i

mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/

de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ skye

mched drug kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i

mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sred pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang

gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ len pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ srid pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings

kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ skye ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rga shi yang

gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan

yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang

gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i

mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi

dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid

kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang

gzhan pa ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid

kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/

chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid

kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/

chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma

lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid

kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos

kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'

yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de

bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/

chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ byang

chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin

nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams

kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshad pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang

gzhan pa ma lags/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings

kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang

gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mngon par shes pa

rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan la// de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i

mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan la/ chos

kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma

lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ byams pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin

nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi

dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan

pa ma lags/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de

bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang

gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i

mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten/ dkar

po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni/ lha dang dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag nag ni/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/ gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnag

cing dkar ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar

rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan par nus so//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni rnam par brtag tu pa/ brjod du pa/ tha snyad pa ste/ 'di ltar bden pa dang / gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba pa dang / 'gag pa pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa pa dang / rnam par byang

ba med pa ste/ 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/ don dam

pa'i bden par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pa

so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang / lam rnam par dgod pa yang / lam bsgom pa yang par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod par lta ga las 'ong / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang

yod/ lam bsgom pa yang yod pas na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bgyi

ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba do// rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa de/ lam gyis

'bras bu 'thob par bya ba yang do// lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can

rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa byed de/ 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas

kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas/ lan cig

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci yang rung ste kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can

du shes pas rang byang chub bo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon myongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos

rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir

'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bde bar

gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'dus byas she 'am/

'dus ma byas shes chos gang la yang ris su gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid

dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos ston to// de bdag kyang

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam
gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje 'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms
par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong

pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag

par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma/ chos gang la yang mngon

par zhen pa do// de mngon par zhen pa pas gang la yang chags pa do// 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa do// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams

su myong ba do// gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la chags pa / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba de/

gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa / bzod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba do// gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs

su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la chags pa / brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla
ba'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug kyang / bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la chags pa / bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs

su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/ shes rab sgom yang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chags pa / shes rab kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan

las bzla ba'i don du shes rab sgom mo// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa'i chos rnams sgom yang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med

pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos

rnams sgom yang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya

ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa / 'dus byas dang 'dus

ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la

spyod de/ chos gang la yang gnas pa 'am/ chags pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do// shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mtshan dang

dpe byad bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / pha tu pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gsum mo// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa do// bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa do// phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa

pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa do// tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa do// 'du shes la yongs su spyod pa do// 'du

byed la yongs su spyod pa do// rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa do// la yongs su spyod pa do// rna ba la yongs su spyod pa do// sna la yongs su spyod pa do// lce la yongs su spyod pa do// lus la yongs su spyod pa de
yid la yongs su spyod pa do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa do// sgra la yongs su spyod pa do// dri la yongs su spyod pa do// ro la yongs su spyod pa do// reg la yongs su spyod pa do// chos

la yongs su spyod pa do// gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa do// lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa

do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa do// sna'i

'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung

ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa

do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa do// sa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa do// chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa do//

khams la yongs su spyod pa do// rlung gi khams la yongs su spyod pa do// nam mkha'i khams la yongs su spyod pa do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa do// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yongs su

spyod pa do// ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa do// 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa do// rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa do// dang gzugs la yongs su spyod pa do// skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa

do// reg pa la yongs su spyod pa do// tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa do// sred pa la yongs su spyod pa do// len pa la yongs su spyod pa do// srid pa la yongs su spyod pa do// skye ba la yongs su spyod pa do// rga shi

la yongs su spyod pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la yongs su spyod pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa do// nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su

spyod pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// 'dus byas

stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// dor ba

pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do//
pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su

spyod pa do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod
pa do// stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la
yongs su spyod pa do// bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// tshad pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// rnam par thar pa brgyad

la yongs su spyod pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la yongs su spyod pa do// mngon par
shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa do// 'jigs

pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa do// byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa do// snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

brgyad la yongs su spyod pa do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa do// dgra bcom pa nyid la

yongs su spyod pa do// rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par yang 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang 'gyur la 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang gda' na/ lam bsgom du ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang

yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i

'khyer pa na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta

bu lags sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sprul

pa lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams cad sprul ba lta bu/ 'du byed thams cad sprul ba
lta bu/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni/ gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis/ 'du byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma

mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am

dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so// mthong ngo rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo rtogs

so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs la sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/ tshad pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon par

shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu

la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu la spyod pa lags/ 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa lags/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod pa

lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs

par/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do//

sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/

sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams gyen du skyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag dang mtshan ma las

gyen du skyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi gis sgro btags

pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa

zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas zhes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya

ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang

byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor ni thams cad gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur ba'i

'dus byas thams cad ni tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs

su brtags pa dngos po pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la/ mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par byed do zhes skul bar byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur

pa'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa
'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs

pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing mtshan ma pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma pa'o zhes bya ba

gnyis su ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing

mtshan ma pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni tsam du bas te/ dang mtshan mar bas la/ btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan

'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis

sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te dngos po'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par thob par yang 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang / dngos po yang pas na/

rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha

rol tu phyin da pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul

gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis tshad pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis

gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma

pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi

yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa

nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis chen po

stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i

tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan

ma pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs

par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa

brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma

pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams

yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis

'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis snying

rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang

dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma
pa dran pa pa/ yid la byed pa pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang zag pa pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa pa'i chos

thams cad ni mtshan ma pa dran pa pa yid la byed pa pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams kyis sems
can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni

dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/

'di dag ni zag pa pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos

so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma pa 'ang

gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma pa 'ang gzhan la rang sangs rgyas kyi

chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma

lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo//

byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos

thams cad ni mtshan ma par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin da pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin da pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid

dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma

pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge

ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba pa ni smon pa pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par

thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la

slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa la slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa la slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don

dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid

la slob pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la
slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/

tshad pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/

'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa

nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu phyin dpal spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so// de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/

dbu ba'i phung po snying po pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu gse tshags dang / shin tu snying po par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no// ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni

gang nas kyang 'ong ba cing / gang du yang 'gro ba pas/ gang nas kyang 'ong gang du yang 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar

na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni skye 'gag 'ong ba / 'gro ba kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byed pa ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing /

de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba/ shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing / 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste

de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba cing gang du yang 'gro ba pas/ gang nas kyang 'ong gang du yang 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de

gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni skye 'gag 'ong ba 'gro ba / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma

yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes

shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la chu shin tu pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba

cing / gang du yang 'gro ba pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid

shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni skye 'gag 'ong ba 'gro ba / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir

de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ chu shing shun pa so sor phye na/ snying po shin tu pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa

yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba cing / gang du yang 'gro ba pas/ gang nas kyang 'ong gang du yang 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa

de/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni skye 'gag 'ong ba 'gro ba / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma

yin/ nam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa

yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni

gang nas kyang 'ong ba cing / gang du yang 'gro ba pas/ gang nas kyang 'ong / gang du yang 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no//

ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni skye 'gag 'ong ba 'gro ba / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par ba byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log

ma yin zhing / de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos

rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ gi khams kyang gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang

gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra'i khams kyang

sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang

bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //

lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi

rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes

pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba par shes

pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa pa dang / tshad pa pa dang / rtag pa pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba pa dang / 'gro ba pa dang / spros pa dang

bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam

'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden

pa ste/ gnyis su pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes

pa yin no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa

yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings

su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni/ rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang so// gal te na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug

par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma

so// de ltar ma pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar btags pa do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings

la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi

dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du

chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas

pa ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /

kha na ma tho ba pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la slob
pas/ chos thams cad la slob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod pas/ ji

ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khams dang skye mched rnams dang /

rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji

ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par

bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/

ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po pa

stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la

bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par

bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la bslab par bgyi/

ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'jigs pa

bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar btang snyoms chen

po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar

rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal

chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/

ji ltar 'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la

bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad snang ba'i lhar skye

bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dge rgyas kyi

lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes

pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang

skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes

'du shes skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum

pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar

sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyis la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyis la bslab

par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang

chub kyi lam la bslabs shing / chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/
gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna

la bslab par bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab par bgyi/ dri la bslab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par bgyi/ reg la bslab par bgyi/

chos la bslab par bgyi/ gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes

pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab

par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/
sa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/

ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/

sred pa la bslab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab

par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang

stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus

byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab
par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i

bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab

par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab

par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la

bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/ spro ba spros par bgyid par 'gyur lags grang // // shes rab kyi pha tu phyin da pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa//

bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid

kyang gzugs so// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes

las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi

dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang

rnam par shes pa'o// kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang go// rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba las gud na

yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi

dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lce yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus las gud

na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang chos

kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra yang chos

kyi dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dri las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang chos kyi

dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ro las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg

las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go// chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//

chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// gi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings

nyid kyang gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi

dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos

kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos

kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//

chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos

kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gi 'dus te reg pa

nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid

kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos

kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg

pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te

reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid

kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba

las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma

mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid

kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams

so// chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// khams kyang chos kyi dbyings

ma lags/ khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang khams so// rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams las

gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams

las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams

las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma

mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings

nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// dang gzugs

kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dang gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dang gzugs so// skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched

drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid

kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred

pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sred pa las gud na yang chos kyi bya dbyings ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ len pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings

ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srid pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings

nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rga

shi las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang

chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid

kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi

dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//

chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
