'jug go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go/ de dag bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// dbang po lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// rnam

par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo// de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ de la la la ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su nyam ste/

rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ 'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab sgom zhes rjod de/ de dag rkyen dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/ nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig/ tshul khrims srungs shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ brtson 'grus

rtsoms shig/ ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig/ rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ 'gro ba 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/
shed can nam/ shed bdag gam/ byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ shes pa po 'am/ mthong ba po 'am/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams sam/ gzugs

kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong

pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang
dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/

'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i

'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ chos gang yang yod dam rtogs shig ces

'dems shing rjes su ston te/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la pas mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos gang yang te/

de la mngon par zhen pa pas chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ 'di ni sems can dmyal

ba pa'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o// 'di ni lha'o/ 'di ni myi'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims

ngan pa can no// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems

can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/

rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ sbyin pa yongs su btang nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu dag sbyin pa de

la 'dzin pas ma 'dzin cig/ sbyin pa la 'dzin pas 'dzin 'dzin cing / lus gang mngon par grub pas/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/ rigs kyi bu 'di la don dam par na sbyin

pa yang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang / sbyin pa'i bdag po yang / len pa yang de/ chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni

gzung du pa'o zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang de la sbyin par
pa / sbyin pa'i bdag por pa / len par pa de/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni su pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de chos gsum po de dag thams

cad la pas/ sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro// rang byang chub la sbyor ro//

bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par

byed de/ de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do// sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas

dga' bar spyod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba

mnyam par skye'o// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob bo// de de dag na yang sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po

bzhis yongs su sdud de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pas yongs su sdud de/ de ltar sems can sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa de dag kyang rim gyis tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do//

bzod pa la rab tu 'god do// brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 'god do// tshad pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do// gzugs pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu 'god do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do// dbang po lnga la rab tu 'god do// stobs lnga

la rab tu 'god do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rab tu 'god do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do// rnam par thar pa brgyad la rab tu 'god do// mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rab tu 'god do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la rab tu 'god do// mngon par shes pa rnams la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin rnams la rab

tu 'god do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do// yang dag par skyon par 'jug par byed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do// phyir 'ong ba'i

'bras bu thob par byed do// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do// rang byang chub thob par byed do// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do// kye skyes bu dag bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ste/ de la phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis khong du ma chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo

nyid kyis yod pa kyis de lta bas na phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la/ 'khor ba las bdag cag kyang thar bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang thar bar gyis shig/ de ltar na khyed bdag cag gi don du yang cher

'gyur/ gzhan yang don chen po la 'byor bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par skul ba byed do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci

nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ nam yang ngan song du ltung ba dang / nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu

'byung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyis don du 'khor

los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes nas/ de 'di skad ces zer te/ su ci 'dod pa de khyed byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi'o// nga ni nang gi gzugs la yang don du gnyer ba na/ gzhan lta la ci smos te/ gzhan du na

ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi/ bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer pa ma yin no zhes te/ de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don

byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu te/ gzhan du na 'du shes dang dang brda'i tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/ rnam par spyod pa de yang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du par shes so// rab 'byor

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang

ba par bya na/ phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba dag lta smos su yang pa de ltar spyad par bya'o// gsol pa/ yo byad de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ni yo byad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do// nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// phyi stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// don

dam pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid

ni yo byad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yo byad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yo byad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yo byad do// dbang po rnams ni yo

byad do// stobs rnams ni yo byad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yo byad do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yo byad do// bsam gtan rnams ni yo byad do//

tshad pa rnams ni yo byad do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do// rnam par thar pa rnams ni yo byad do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ni yo byad do// mngon par shes pa rnams ni yo byad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yo byad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yo byad do//

'jigs pa rnams ni yo byad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yo byad do// snying rje chen po ni yo byad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yo byad do// de dag ni yo byad do/ yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams

yongs su bsdus shing / rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// rab 'byor

ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams la 'di skad du tshur sheg/ rigs kyi bu dag tshul khrims srungs shig/ ngas khyed la zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang /

bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DU r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad

gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa par bya'o// khyed phongs pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur grang na/ khyed zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos

dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci

yang rung ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs pa par byas/ de bas na khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims gnos la rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg

pa 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo // gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro// tshul khrims

kyi legs pa rjod do// sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims

la skyar cing / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la

sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can gang khro ba dang / gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na de dag la 'di

skad ces zer ro// rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/ gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang / de nga las long shig/ ngas khyed la zas dang / skom dang / gos dang /

bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang /

gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa par byas/ khro ba dang / gnod sems par gyis shig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/ 'di skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po pa ste/ de la dngos po gang yang do// khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par

yongs su brtags pa ste/ dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon te/ gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang / de ltar 'thabs shing 'khon te/ gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang / mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang / phan

tshun gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang na/ de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas

dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu yang khyed sdug bsngal bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/ skyes bu khyed

rnams dngos po pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas myir skye ba yang 'thob par 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su yang pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig/ grogs po dag

sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no// myir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no// 'khor ba las thar ba ni dkon no// de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don par ma bya shig khom par gyur cing gsor

rung bar gyur ta re zhes/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub bo/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo// bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do// sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom

pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing / bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos

yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa

yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces rjod de/ de dag rkyen dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/ kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/ tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/ bzod pa'i rkyen tam/ gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus

brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/ brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/ sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/

de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// de dag bsgoms pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

'thob bo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo// rang byang chub 'thob bo// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo// gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do// sems can gzhan gang brtson

'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing / brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/

rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams

yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor

'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ 'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog ces rjod de/ de dag rkyen dang ldan

pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/ kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba de lta

bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sgrub ste/ de'i phyir de
dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan bzhi ba la
snyoms par 'jug go/ byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go/ dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go/ btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms
par 'jug go/ de dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo//

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// dbang po lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo// de dag

bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ de la la la ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su nyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ 'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab sgom zhes rjod de/ de dag rkyen dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/ nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig/ tshul khrims srungs shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig
brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/ ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig/ rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/ bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/
'gro ba 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed can nam/ shed bdag gam/ byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ shes pa po 'am/ mthong ba po 'am/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du

byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams sam/ gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/

chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dam/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/

chos gang yang yod dam rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la pas mngon par zhen par 'gyur

ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang te/ de la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes

su ma mthong bas/ 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni myi'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni tshul
khrims ngan pa can no// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub

sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la

gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba

bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag

par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /

yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba

yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa rnams bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems

can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab

'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs

su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing

stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin

zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo//

byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can

rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi

bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor

ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po rnams sgom mo// dbang po lnga bsgoms pas/ 'khor

ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par

'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs

su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can mgon pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ kha zas dang / gos kyis phongs pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed tshur shog nga las

zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang

man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan thogs shig/ de ni khyed la yun ring por don dang phan pa dang

bde bar 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar don 'di ni pha bi'i yin gyi/ bdag gi ma yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o// don 'di ni bdag gis yun ring po nas sems can rnams kyi don du bsgrubs pa yin no zhes de ltar khyed kyis bdag gi yin

par soms la/ sems can rnams la yongs su thong shig/ sbyin pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig/ bzod pa la sbyor cig/ brtson 'grus la sbyor cig/ bsam gtan la sbyor cig/ shes rab la sbyor cig/ nang stong

pa nyid la sbyor cig/ phyi stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ chen po stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ 'dus byas stong pa

nyid la sbyor cig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/

chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor cig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor cig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor cig/ dbang po rnams la sbyor cig/ stobs rnams la sbyor cig/ byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams la sbyor cig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor cig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor cig/ bsam gtan rnams la sbyor cig/ tshad pa rnams la sbyor cig/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa rnams la sbyor cig/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor cig/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor cig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la sbyor cig

mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyor cig/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyor cig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyor cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor cig/ 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor cig/ so so yang dag par rig

pa bzhi la sbyor cig/ snying rje chen po la sbyor cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sbyor cig/ de tsam gyis dga' bar ma sems par gong du 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa rnams la khod cig/ 'di lta ste/ rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu la khod cig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la khod cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la khod cig/ dgra bcom pa nyid la khod cig/ rang byang chub la khod cig/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

la khod cig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar yongs su

smyin par byas pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'thar ba nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su 'thar ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o// rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed tshul khrims ngan pa byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang /

bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang /

gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan thogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas te/ de dag sdom pa'i tshul khrims

ma zhig pa ma god pa ma 'dres pa skyon pa mnyams pa rang dbang yod pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyur 'gyur ba la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la

gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas
rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye

bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la

gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can sems 'khrugs

pa dang / gnod sems su gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed gnod sems su byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang /

gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel

dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/ des bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan
pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag bzod pa sgom ste/ 'khrug pa pa dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems su gyur pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas

shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas

'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong

pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lar gnas/ dngos po

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ba gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan
lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la
gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

gnas shing / sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed le lo byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom

dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang /

byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/ de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan

'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ le lo cing brtson 'grus rtsom par gyur pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la

gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos

thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la gnas/ mngon
par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying

rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can sems g.yengs par gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang mi ldan pas khyed sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la
bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug ba dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru

dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/ de
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag bsam gtan sgom ste/ sems g.yeng ba cing mnyam

par gzhag par gyur pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dmigs pa stong pa

nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la
gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la

gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas shing / rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar yongs su

smin par byas pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'thar ba nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su 'thar ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la gnas shing / sems can shes rab 'chal par gyur pa blo chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs

kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya

dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can

de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ rmongs pa cing / shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/

phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/
rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa

bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'thar ba nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su
'thar ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu rtsa drug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

pos de lta bu'i go bgo bar bya na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam ji lta bu zhig yod snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog

par thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo//

rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
lam mo// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo//

rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor
stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor bsam gtan ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor tshad pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo//
rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo
rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba dang / gang la ma bslabs kyang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang med de/ chos thams cad la ma
bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par nus so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad stong pa lags na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ji ltar bslab par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed do zhes bgyi ba'am/ 'di dag go zhes bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'jig

rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ so so'i skye bo'i

chos ni 'di dag go/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag

go/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ zhes bgyi ba ni spros pa ma mchis pa 'phro bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no//

de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni stong pa'o// rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing / bla na
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la

bslabs shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor khyod kyis gzhan yang gang 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyed do zhes bya ba 'am/ 'di dag go zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
ni 'di dag go/ zag pa pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ so so'i skye bo'i chos ni 'di dag go/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag
go/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di

dag go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go zhes bya bar chos rnam par dbye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag gis de ltar chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar shes sam/ gal te shes
na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ rab 'byor sems can 'di dag chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya
bar shes pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos rnam par dgod par byas shing / sems can rnams
la chos ston to// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod pas/ thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ mngon par 'du bya ba ma gtogs par 'di la

chos gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis su do zhes bya bar yongs su brtag par bya'o// de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la de ltar rtog pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa

nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang
tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po

pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'am/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'am/ dbang
po lnga 'am/ stobs lnga 'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi 'am/ tshad pa bzhi 'am/ gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'am/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'am/ mngon par shes pa

rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'am/ 'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa brgyad dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ chos gang la yang mngon par chags par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la

mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang su na/ gang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la

mngon par zhen pa par chos thams cad kyis rnam par spyod do// de bslabs pa 'di la gnas shing / sems can 'di dag ci la spyod ces sems can gyi spyod pa la lta ste/ de 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag

pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa la spyod de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa las dgrol bar bya na dka' ba byed do zhes nas/ de'i tshe thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'di skad du ston to//

kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ sbyin pa byin cig des khyed longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur gyis/ longs spyod des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du tshul khrims la 'dems te/ kye sems

can dag tshur sheg\tshul khrims srungs shig tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du bzod pa la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg bzod pa sgoms shig bzod pa des kyang

rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du brtson 'grus la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg brtson 'grus rtsoms shig brtson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang

yang do// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du shes rab

la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg shes rab sgoms shig/ shes rab des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/

nang stong pa nyid sgoms shig nang stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg phyi stong pa nyid sgoms shig phyi stong pa

nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg phyi nang stong pa nyid sgoms shig phyi nang stong pa nyid des kyang rlom

sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed

cig de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg chen po stong pa nyid sgoms shig chen po stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang

yang do// de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig don dam pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang

do// de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgoms shig 'dus byas stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang med do//

de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgoms shig 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang med do// de

bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang

med do// de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du dor ba pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/

de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/

de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su

ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/
pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du dngos po pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid sgoms
shig/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/

dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dems

te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgoms shig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba

rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgoms shig/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgoms shig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du
dbang po rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dbang po rnams sgoms shig/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du stobs rnams la 'dems

te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ stobs rnams sgoms shig/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ byang chub

kyi yan lag rnams sgoms shig/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag

tshur sheg/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du bsam
gtan rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ bsam gtan rnams sgoms shig/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du tshad pa
rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ tshad pa rnams sgoms shig/ tshad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du gzugs pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgoms shig/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig
de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgoms shig/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang
rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams sgoms shig/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sgoms shig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can
dag tshur sheg/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgoms shig/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams la 'dems te/
kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgoms shig/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'dems
te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgoms shig/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang
do// de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ 'jigs pa bzhi sgoms shig/ 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang

yang do// de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgoms shig/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/

de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du snying rje chen po la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ snying rje chen po sgoms shig/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de

bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgoms shig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/

de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu des kyang rlom sems su ma

byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dgra bcom pa nyid sgoms shig/ dgra bcom pa des kyang rlom sems

su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang do// de bzhin du rang byang chub la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang byang chub sgoms shig/ rang byang chub des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po

gang yang do// de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgoms shig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po

gang yang do// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de

la snying po gang yang do// zhes de de ltar sems can rnams la 'dems pa dang / rjes su ston pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod kyang / gang la yang mngon par zhen pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni mngon

par zhen pa pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/ gang gis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa// rab

'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod kyang gang la yang mi gnas te/ de gnas pa pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod kyang de la gnas so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la gnas so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la gnas

so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la gnas so// de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po ni/ bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //

gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gnyis pa ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan

gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gsum pa ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis

mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //

gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de byams pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byams pa ni byams

pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de snying rje la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe

na/ de ni 'di ltar snying rje ni snying rje'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas

te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dga' ba ni dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de btang snyoms

la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar btang snyoms ni btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag

kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rang bzhin

gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe

na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin

gyis stong ngo // de pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pa'i skye mched ni pa'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin

gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes 'du shes

skye mched ni 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa/ de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //

de rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis

mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhog pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

bzhi la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam
