lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de

bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa rnams lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes

so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang lam la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sgra brnyan la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// yor la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// smyig

rgyu la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sgyu ma la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sprul pa la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams

dngos po par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yor lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po par 'dzin te/ de ltar

bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ smyig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob

par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
pa yang gzung du do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du do// tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du do// nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
gzung du do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzung du do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do/ dngos po pa stong

pa nyid kyang gzung du do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzung du do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang

gzung du do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// dbang po rnams kyang gzung du do// stobs rnams kyang gzung du do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzung du do// 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa yang gzung du do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung du do// bsam gtan rnams kyang gzung du do// tshad pa rnams kyang gzung du do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du
do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzung du do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang
gzung du do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzung du do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzung du do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du
med do// 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du do/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzung du do// byams pa chen po yang gzung du do// snying rje chen po yang gzung du do// sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gzung du par shes par byas shing bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer to//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gzung du cing dngos po pa ste/ lam lta bu sgra brnyan lta bu yor lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems
can rnams kyi chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ba ma gtogs par gzung du pa'i chos kyis gzung du pa'i chos gang yang thob par nus pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can

thams cad kyi don du/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du gtong ngo //

tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du srung ngo // bzod pa gang ci sgom yang / sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom mo// brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du rtsom
mo// bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du mnyam par gzhog go// shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom ste/ bdag gi don du ma yin no//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems
can gang sems can pa las sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su
gnas pa dang / gso ba pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / skyes bu pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gang zag pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed can pa la shed can

gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed bdag pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed pa po pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su

gnas pa dang / slong ba po pa la slong ba bo'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong du 'jug pa po pa la slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba po pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /

tshor du 'jug pa po pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shes pa po pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci
log las rnam par 'grel te/ phyin ci log las rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba pa'i dbyings su 'god do// de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su rgyu ste/ bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du
shes sam/ srog gi 'du shes sam/ 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang zag gi 'du shes sam/ shed can gyi 'du shes sam/ shed bdag gi 'du shes
sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ slong ba bo'i 'du shes sam/ slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du
shes sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'dar ba dang / spros pa 'di dag btang nas/ spros pa

pa'i sems kyis/ nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid kyang chos gang
la yang mngon par zhen pa la/ sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa pa la rab tu 'god de/ de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni
pa ste/ gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na/
gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de/ gnyis su
pas kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de/ gang la gnyis kyang la/ gnyis pa yang pa ni thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni thob
pa'o// 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/ chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa de/ spros pa pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo
bo nyid rnams la/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid des bgyi ba yang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dngos po pa dang / dngos po pa yang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid pa dang /
yongs su brjod pa pa 'di ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni brjod du pa'o// chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang de/ chos mnyam
pa nyid ni chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o// chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa 'am/ 'phags pa 'am/ chos gang gis kyang shes par rung zhing / yul ma yin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po de de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma
yin te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
yul ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
gyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na/ rab 'byor so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa

rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos

mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid

gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang do// de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di

ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba de/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa
nyid la so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir 'ong ba'o//

'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag

na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems
dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no//

de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang
sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par do// gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das de ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang
sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du
sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog
kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog
gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/ ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa mtshan nyid gcig
pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o// de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir
'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod
par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yul/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
par sangs ma rgyas la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir/ chos rnams rnam par dgod pa ma mdzad na/ sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/ byol song gi skye gnas yod par
mngon nam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/ yod par mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams
yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon

nam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung snang gi lha yod par mngon
nam/ tshad snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad dge ba'i lha yod par mngon
nam/ dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/
che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 'og gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ pa'i skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'du shes 'du shes
skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par

mngon nam/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon
nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/
thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang
gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon
nam/ dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam/ stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par
mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam/ tshad pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzugs
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod par mngon nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo
rnams yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam/
byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan
thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod
yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ phyir
'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mchis par mngon par 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pa//
rab de lta bas na/ de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ chos rnams rnam par dgod pa (par)mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// //
shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba
de bzhin du/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin
du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du brgyad pa yang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rgyun tu
zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du phyir 'ong ba rnams

kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags
sam/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo'o// chos mnyam pa nyid las 'da'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin

nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de

nyid ni/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa

nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /

chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos

nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin

pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de

bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba

rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag

pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi
dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /

gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag
pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de de las rnam par 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid

dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/ de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang do// rab

kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nyid/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang

ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir 'ong ba

rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du

shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / gi rnam par shes pa dang /

gi 'dus te reg pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i

'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te

reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / khams dang /

rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba'i rnam pa

thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /

'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong

pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te/ bcom ldan 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu 'dra ba/ gcig las gcig 'das pa'o// bcom ldan

'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid

kyang gzhan te/ gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang

gzhan/ sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i

rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos
nyid kyang gzhan/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang
gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ khams kyi chos

nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/

rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i chos

nyid kyang gzhan/ len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gti mug gi

chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang

gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi

chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang

gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa

pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid

kyang gzhan/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams

kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnam par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/ chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol
tu pa la spyod par nus na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon par

zhugs nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs

par bgyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa yongs su rdzogs par
bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha tu pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par rtse bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ de dag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can
rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab gang 'di skad du de ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos

mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid
brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun tu zhus pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos

mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de

nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab

'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du

byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong

pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa

de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ro'i chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid

stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa/ de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang

yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos

nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos

nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin

pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par

shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ reg pa'i chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin

pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha tu pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid

stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma

yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa

de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ pa stong pa nyid

kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de

nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang

yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i

bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshad pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa

de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams

kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nam/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid

stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang

yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos

nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang

yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de

nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la/

gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ gi mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i
mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/ ro'i mtshan nyid dam/ reg gi

mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus

kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus

te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan

nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug gi

mtshan nyid dam/ reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ len pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid

dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chen po stong pa

nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma

dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi

mtshan nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye

bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshad pa rnams kyi

mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong

pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan

nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang byang chub kyi

mtshan nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir 'ong ba'i

mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta

bu'i chos gang yang sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de

la yang so so'i skye bo / so so'i skye bo las gud na yang de / de la yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na yang de / de la yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba

las gud na yang de / de la yang brgyad pa / brgyad pa las gud na yang de / de la yang rgyun tu zhugs pa / rgyun tu zhugs pa las gud na yang de / de la yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba / lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na

yang de / de la yang phyir 'ong ba / phyir 'ong ba las gud na yang de / de la yang dgra bcom pa / dgra bcom pa las gud na yang de / de la yang rang sangs rgyas / rang sangs rgyas las gud na yang de / de la yang byang chub sems

dpa' / byang chub sems dpa' las gud na yang de / de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa / de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas su de// 'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas su de/ rab 'byor de ltar 'dus

byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs pa bstan du pa/ thogs pa pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid pa'o//

de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin te/ don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed de/ lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi

'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na yang don dam pa su do// 'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang g.yo la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun cu gcig go// /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de'i slad du chos gang la yang gang yang ci yang bgyid

pa ma mchis na/ de ltar chos thams cad ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis shing / ci yang ma lags pa ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang g.yo la/

sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyi ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ stong pa

nyid gang yin pa de ni gang la yang ci yang byed pa yang / ci yang byed pa yang de/ gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/ de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang g.yo la/ sems can rnams kyang bdag gi

'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor

ba las 'grel pa dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srog gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/

stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gso ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
skyes bu'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gang zag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
'grel pa dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

shed bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las

'grel pa dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang

phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du

shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid

kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar

byed cing / 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong
pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

rna ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'du shes

dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'du shes dang phral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba

las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/

stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sgra'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / dri'i 'du shes

dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / ro'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ro'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed

cing / reg gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chos kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chos kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /

gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar

byed cing / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang

phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /

lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang

bral bar byed cing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral

nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i

'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus

te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis

'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes

dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du

shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa

nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las

'grel pa dang / sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chu'i khams kyi

'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rlung

gi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid gyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / nam mkha'i khams

kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong

pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

'du byed kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral par byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa

dang / dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye mched drug

gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral

bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sred pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sred pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /

len pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / len pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/

stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

rga shi'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ 'dus ma byas kyi
dbyings stong pa yin yang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//

sprul pa de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma lags/ mi ldan pa yang ma lags te/

de gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ de ci'i slad du/ 'di ni stong pa nyid do// 'di ni sprul pa'o// zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab pa mdzad/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / sprul
pa gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma
yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa lags kyang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye

bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar

pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs

kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad

dang / de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o//

la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o// la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o// la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o// la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o// rab
'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni sprul pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong
'od ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'am/ sangs rgyas kyis 'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab bskyed pa 'am/ bkag pa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni sprul pa'o// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pa/ chos gang la skye ba yang / 'gag pa yang med pa de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsold pa/ da gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pa/ mi mnyam
ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang g.yo la/ gnyis su yang dmigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyid
ma pa de lta bu do// zhes bka' pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
pa/ rab de de bzhin no// de de bzhind te/ rab chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma
byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rab kyis gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pa/ rab ci sngon dngos
po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po par 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'di la dngos po yod pa yang med/ dngos po pa yang / ngo bo nyid kyang / gzhan gyi dngos po yang na/ de la gang yongs

su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan// shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos nyid 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// /
